TestCase.Title: Check_Credit_Balance
TestCase.Purpose: Try to find out if the attached card is a ec card (eletronic cash - money card)

Command.Text: Perform a cold reset of the card in order to ensure all temporary data is removed

TestStep.TechnicalCommand: var command = new ByteString("00 A4 00 0C 02 3F 00 00", HEX); card.gt_sendCommand(command);

TestStep.Description: Select the eC card application with following {aid} in a plain SELECT Application APDU

Command.Text: Select record based file with file ID

TestStep.TechnicalCommand: var command = new ByteString("00 A4 02 0C 02 01 04 00", HEX); card.gt_sendCommand(command);

Command.Text: Try to read record with record number 1

TestStep.TechnicalCommand: var command = new ByteString("00 B2 01 04 00", HEX); var response = card.gt_sendCommand(command);

ExpectedResult.Text: The read record command returns a ByteString. In the ByteString the rest on cash money on the card is coded.
